subscribe_text: Subscribe to receive our latest collections and private events.
about_intro: At VELORA JEWEL , we redefine luxury with unparalleled craftsmanship and timeless elegance. Inspired by the finest traditions of haute joaillerie, our exquisite collections are a celebration of artistry, sophistication, and exclusivity.
our_legacy_text: Founded with a passion for perfection, VELORA JEWEL combines meticulous handcrafting techniques with contemporary designs. Each piece is a symbol of opulence, created to elevate every moment into a statement of prestige.
craftsmanship_text: Every jewel is masterfully designed using the world's rarest gemstones and the finest metals. Our artisans bring decades of expertise, ensuring each creation embodies the pinnacle of luxury and brilliance.
elegance_text: VELORA JEWEL is more than a brand—it’s an experience of extraordinary beauty and exclusivity. We invite you to explore our collections and indulge in the ultimate expression of sophistication.

signin_prompt: Enter your personal details to use all site features
signup_prompt: Register with your personal details to use all site features
quote_text: I believe the things I make have museum quality and hopefully, will last as long as the originals that inspired them
workshop_paragraph: The VELORA JEWEL workshop proudly sits above our Madison Avenue Flagship Boutique, and provides the house with unparalleled access to jewelry as it is being created. Every VELORA JEWEL jewel is meticulously handcrafted by our master jewelers, from stone setting and gold hammering, to hard stone carving and enameling
archive_paragraph: VELORA JEWEL holds a collection of past designs and collections, showcasing the brand’s evolution over time. It allows customers to explore timeless pieces and learn about the craftsmanship behind each creation
